mapper.select: SELECT t.team_idx ,t.logo ,t.team_name ,(SELECT id FROM member m WHERE m.id = t.id AND t.team_idx = #{param1}) AS id ,t.team_address ,t.team_level ,(SELECT COUNT(tl.team_idx) FROM team_list tl WHERE tl.team_idx = #{param1}) AS teamCount ,t.team_info FROM team t WHERE t.team_idx = #{param1}
SELECT (SELECT id FROM member m WHERE m.id = tl.id) AS id ,tl.team_date FROM team_list tl WHERE tl.team_idx = #{param2} ORDER BY tl.team_date asc LIMIT #{param1}, 10

SELECT applicant_idx ,id ,(SELECT level FROM member m WHERE m.id = tjl.id) AS level ,(SELECT position FROM member m WHERE m.id = tjl.id) AS position FROM team_join_list tjl WHERE join_team_idx = (SELECT join_team_idx FROM team_join tj WHERE team_idx = #{param2}) ORDER BY applicant_idx asc LIMIT #{param1}, 10
SELECT CEIL(COUNT((SELECT level FROM member m WHERE m.id = tjl.id))/10) AS totalPage FROM team_join_list tjl WHERE join_team_idx = (SELECT join_team_idx FROM team_join tj WHERE team_idx = #{param1})

SELECT join_team_idx ,join_team_gender ,join_team_level ,join_team_position FROM team_join tj JOIN team t ON tj.team_idx = t.team_idx WHERE t.id = #{param2} AND tj.join_team_state = "공개" AND tj.team_idx = #{param1} ORDER BY tj.join_team_idx DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT guest_idx ,guest_gender ,guest_level ,guest_position FROM guest_join gj JOIN team t ON gj.team_idx = t.team_idx WHERE t.id = #{param3} AND gj.guest_state = "공개" AND gj.team_idx = #{param2} ORDER BY gj.guest_idx DESC LIMIT #{param1},#{param4};
SELECT CEIL(((COUNT(join_team_idx)) + (SELECT COUNT(guest_idx) FROM guest_join gj WHERE id = #{param2}))/10) AS totalPage FROM team_join WHERE team_idx = #{param1};
SELECT tq.id ,team_ban FROM team_quit tq JOIN team t ON tq.team_idx = t.team_idx WHERE t.team_idx = #{param2} LIMIT #{param1},10;
SELECT id ,level ,position ,gender ,address FROM member WHERE id = #{param1};
